text: HBO Max’s new TV and movie release schedule for May 5 to May 11, 2025, includes The Playboy Murders Season 3, Conan O’Brien Must Go Season 2, The Whale, Delicious Miss Brown Season 10, and many others. On May 5, The Playboy Murders Season 3 drops on HBO Max. The documentary series revolves around murder cases connected with the popular Playboy magazine. Every episode offers a shocking insight that might change one’s perspective about the publication. Further, Conan O’Brien Must Go Season 2 will be available on the streaming platform. The talk show follows host O’Brien meeting his fans in person after letting them feature through a video call on his podcast. He leaves his fans surprised while exploring the local culture and cuisine. Also coming out on HBO Max is the melodrama film The Whale (2022) this week. It follows an unhealthy English teacher named Charlie who develops an obsessive eating habit. He wishes to reunite with his teenage daughter, seeking a final chance for a change. Additionally, Delicious Miss Brown Season 10 will release on the streaming platform. The cooking show narrates the journey of modern southern cook, Kardea Brown. She shares exciting recipes with her viewers that have left a strong impact on her life. New HBO Max releases for May 5-11, 2025 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to HBO Max from May 5 to May 11, 2025. May 6 Fareed Zakaria: The War on Government (CNN) Talking Pictures Podcast – Special Video Episode with Eli Roth Recorded At TCM Classic Film Festival The Playboy Murders, Season 3 (ID) Toxic, Season 1 (ID) May 8 Conan O’Brien Must Go, Season 2 (Max Original) May 9  Bloody Trophy (Krwawe Trofeum) (Max Original) The Whale (A24, 2022) May 11 Delicious Miss Brown, Season 10 (Food Network) The Bakersfield 3: A Tale of Murder and Motherhood, Season 1 (ID) For more HBO Max content, check out an update on the Jonestown series. html:
HBO Max’s new TV and movie release schedule for May 5 to May 11, 2025, includes The Playboy Murders Season 3, Conan O’Brien Must Go Season 2, The Whale, Delicious Miss Brown Season 10, and many others.

On May 5, The Playboy Murders Season 3 drops on HBO Max. The documentary series revolves around murder cases connected with the popular Playboy magazine. Every episode offers a shocking insight that might change one’s perspective about the publication.

Further, Conan O’Brien Must Go Season 2 will be available on the streaming platform. The talk show follows host O’Brien meeting his fans in person after letting them feature through a video call on his podcast. He leaves his fans surprised while exploring the local culture and cuisine.

Also coming out on HBO Max is the melodrama film The Whale (2022) this week. It follows an unhealthy English teacher named Charlie who develops an obsessive eating habit. He wishes to reunite with his teenage daughter, seeking a final chance for a change.

Additionally, Delicious Miss Brown Season 10 will release on the streaming platform. The cooking show narrates the journey of modern southern cook, Kardea Brown. She shares exciting recipes with her viewers that have left a strong impact on her life.

New HBO Max releases for May 5-11, 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to HBO Max from May 5 to May 11, 2025.

May 6

  • Fareed Zakaria: The War on Government (CNN)
  • Talking Pictures Podcast – Special Video Episode with Eli Roth Recorded At TCM Classic Film Festival
  • The Playboy Murders, Season 3 (ID)
  • Toxic, Season 1 (ID)

May 8

  • Conan O’Brien Must Go, Season 2 (Max Original)

May 9 

  • Bloody Trophy (Krwawe Trofeum) (Max Original)
  • The Whale (A24, 2022)

May 11

  • Delicious Miss Brown, Season 10 (Food Network)
  • The Bakersfield 3: A Tale of Murder and Motherhood, Season 1 (ID)

For more HBO Max content, check out an update on the Jonestown series. Also, here is the release date for The Gilded Age Season 3.
